means: 自我中心的，自私自利的

word_mean: 自我中心的，自负的，利己的：一切思想意识均集中于自我的，以自我利益与需要占先的，不关心别人的。参见allocentric

sentence.Network_en: Throughout his school life Darius was tactless and egocentric.
sentence.Network_cn: 上学期间，达赖厄斯粗鲁冒失，而且总以自我为中心。

sentence.Network_en: He was egocentric, a man of impulse who expected those around him to serve him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是个以自我为中心、易冲动的人，希望身边的人都为他服务。

sentence.Network_en: He is egocentric and never considers others.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是个以自我为中心不为别人着想的人。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent.: from ego, on the pattern of words such as geocentric

entry.tran: 以自我为中心的;个人主义的;自私自利的
entry.def: Someone who is egocentric thinks only of themselves and their own wants, and does not consider other people.

example.ex: He was egocentric, a man of impulse who expected those around him to serve him.
example.tran: 他是个以自我为中心、易冲动的人，希望身边的人都为他服务。

means.word_mean: 1. a self-centered person with little regard for others
1. limited to or caring only about yourself and your own needs

auth_sentence.content: The word myopic and egocentric keep coming back to me.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The word myopic and egocentric keep coming back to me.

auth_sentence.content: Delegates discussed how some dance companies promoted competition and egocentric behaviour.
auth_sentence.res_content: Delegates discussed how some dance companies promoted competition and egocentric behaviour.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Delegates discussed how some dance companies promoted competition and egocentric behaviour.

auth_sentence.content: To do nothing is to doom a decent but egocentric species to extinction.
auth_sentence.res_content: To do nothing is to doom a decent but egocentric species to extinction.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To do nothing is to doom a decent but egocentric species to extinction.
